get.description: Retrieve flight offers by query string parameters.

parameters.name: Origin
parameters.description: Routekey (single or multiple) of the origin based on airport IATA-code, comma separated

parameters.name: Destination
parameters.description: Routekey (single or multiple) of the destination based on airport IATA-code, comma separated

parameters.name: OriginDepartureDate
parameters.description: Date / Range to depart from origin airport. Must be in format yyyyMMdd or yyyyMM.

parameters.name: OriginArrivalDate
parameters.description: Date / Range to arrive at origin airport. Must be in format yyyyMMdd or yyyyMM.

parameters.name: DestinationDepartureDate
parameters.description: Date / Range to depart from destination airport. Must be in format yyyyMMdd or yyyyMM.

parameters.name: DestinationArrivalDate
parameters.description: Date / Range to arrive at destination airport. Must be in format yyyyMMdd or yyyyMM.

parameters.name: OriginDepartureTime
parameters.description: Time range in which to depart from origin airport. Must be in format (0000-2359).

parameters.name: OriginArrivalTime
parameters.description: Time range in which to arrive at origin airport. Must be in format (0000-2359).

parameters.name: DestinationDepartureTime
parameters.description: Time range in which to depart from destination airport. Must be in format (0000-2359).

parameters.name: DestinationArrivalTime
parameters.description: Time range in which to arrive on destination airport. Must be in format (0000-2359).

parameters.name: OriginDepartureDayOfWeek
parameters.description: Preferred departureday(s) of week to depart from origin airport, comma separated (mo,th,we).

parameters.name: OriginArrivalDayOfWeek
parameters.description: Preferred departureday(s) of week to arrive on origin airport, comma separated (mo,th,we).

parameters.name: DestinationDepartureDayOfWeek
parameters.description: Preferred departureday(s) of week to depart from destination airport, comma separated (mo,th,we).

parameters.name: DestinationArrivalDayOfWeek
parameters.description: Preferred departureday(s) of week to arrive on destination airport, comma separated (mo,th,we).

parameters.name: DaysAtDestination
parameters.description: Duration in days of the time spent on the destination. Return on the same day means 1 day at destination.

parameters.name: DirectFlight
parameters.description: When set to true, will only return direct flights.

parameters.name: Adults
parameters.description: Number of adult passengers (default = 1)

parameters.name: Children
parameters.description: Number of children passengers (default = 0)

parameters.name: Price
parameters.description: Price range in euro's or loyalty points for the flight offer.

parameters.name: GroupPricing
parameters.description: Show price-per-adult by default, or price for all passengers when set to true.

parameters.name: ProductClass
parameters.description: Product Class or branded fare (basic, plus, max) (default = basic)

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Paging number of the limited result set (default = 0)

parameters.name: Include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of 'advanced/optional' fields to be included in the response. Allowed values: ClassOfService

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields on which the result must be ordered. Allowed values: 'Origin', 'Destination', 'OriginDepartureDate', 'DestinationArrivalDate', 'Price'. For return flights also the values 'DestinationDepartureDate' and 'OriginArrivalDate' can be used. (default = OriginDepartureDate, Origin, Destination)

parameters.name: LowestPricePerDestination
parameters.description: Return only the lowest price per destination when set to true (default = false)

parameters.name: Loyalty
parameters.description: When set to "FlyingBlue", filtering is based on Flying Blue points and results are returned in Flying Blue points.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items in the response (default = 100, max = 1000 for one-way / 200 for round-trip). Can also be used in combination with OrderByEnum to return first or last item (default = 1000, max = 1000) If the response is limitted a ResultSet element is added to the response root element containing a link to request the next offset.
